meanings.definition: A person or thing that accepts something.
meanings.sent1: The kind acceptor thanked everyone for the gifts.
meanings.sent2: The new student was a quick acceptor of the school rules.
meanings.sent3: The hungry acceptor eagerly took the last slice of pizza.
meanings.sent4: The mailbox stood as a silent acceptor of letters from all over.
meanings.sent5: The charity was a warm acceptor of donations for those in need.

meanings.definition: A chemical substance that accepts electrons.
meanings.sent1: The oxygen molecule acted as an electron acceptor in the reaction.
meanings.sent2: The battery's cathode served as an electron acceptor during discharge.
meanings.sent3: The electron acceptor at the party was the life of the celebration.
meanings.sent4: The semiconductor material functioned as an electron acceptor in the circuit.
meanings.sent5: The enzyme acted as a willing acceptor of electrons in the metabolic process.
